import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import commerce from './Commerce'; const CheckoutDetails = ({ finishCheckout }) => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { let tokenID = localStorage.getItem("checkout"); commerce.checkout.getToken(tokenID).then((token) => { alert(JSON.stringify(token)) }).catch((error) => { alert(JSON.stringify(error)) }); }, []); return ( <> {show ? (
{/*
Shipping
*/}
) : ( "don't show" )} ) } export default CheckoutDetails;
